hero.name: BOUALLEGUI YOUNES
hero.tagline: CLI Tools | CI/CD | n8n | Cloud & AI

about.title: About
about.description: Motivated and detail-oriented engineering student with a strong foundation in Wireless Intelligent Networks (WIN) and DevOps practices. Experienced in designing and implementing automation-oriented CLI tools, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud-native deployments. Proficient in Java, Python, and modern web technologies, with hands-on experience in Spring Boot, Docker, Kubernetes, and DevOps toolchains. Strong interest in automation (n8n), infrastructure reliability, and scalable system design. Eager to contribute to innovative, production-grade engineering projects.
about.automationFirstDesc: Eliminating manual processes through intelligent automation with n8n workflows
about.infrastructureDesc: Designing resilient and scalable cloud-native architectures
about.cicdExpertDesc: GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins pipelines for rapid, reliable deployments
about.cloudNativeDesc: Docker, Kubernetes, and modern cloud solutions

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: A selection of automation and infrastructure projects I've built
projects.mainTitle: DevOps Project â€“ Design and Implementation of Automation-Oriented CLI Tools
projects.mainDesc: Complete DevOps lifecycle with CLI tools, CI/CD pipelines, n8n automation, and AI-powered documentation.
projects.mainLongDesc: CLI tools for application lifecycle management (init, run, backup, restore, upgrade, downgrade). Complete DevOps lifecycle with GitLab CI/CD and Jenkins. Code quality enforcement with SonarQube quality gates. Artifact and image management via Nexus and DockerHub. Advanced automation with n8n workflows including pipeline cancellation, alerts, and notifications. Intelligent deployment decision system (deploy now, cancel, custom scheduling). AI-powered documentation platform for User, Technical, and API guides. Monitoring and observability with Prometheus and Grafana. Containerization and orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes.
projects.jenkinsDesc: Complete Jenkins-based DevOps environment with quality gates and monitoring.
projects.jenkinsLongDesc: Project retrieval from GitHub. Source code quality verification using SonarQube. Artifact creation and hosting with Nexus. Docker image publishing to DockerHub. Concurrent startup of services and Angular application testing using docker-compose. Monitoring and data visualization with Prometheus and Grafana.
projects.springDesc: Full-stack web application for employee and intern management.
projects.springLongDesc: Comprehensive web application built with Spring Boot for managing employees and interns, featuring a complete backend with RESTful APIs and secure authentication.
projects.microservicesDesc: Microservices-based notification, chatroom, and event management system.
projects.microservicesLongDesc: Backend built with Spring Boot microservices architecture. Frontend developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features real-time notifications, chat functionality, and event management.
projects.votingDesc: Linux-based web voting application developed in C.
projects.votingLongDesc: A robust web voting application built in C for Linux environments, featuring secure vote handling and result processing.
projects.energyDesc: ML/DL research project on energy optimization in 5G networks.
projects.energyLongDesc: Research project applying Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques to analyze and optimize energy consumption patterns in 5G network infrastructures.
